message.name: ERR_CONTRACTTEXT_FV_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: This contract text has already been cancelled.
This contract text has already been canceled.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTTEXT_FV_BLANK
message.locale: Contract text must not be blank.

message.name: ERR_LANGUAGECODE_FV_BLANK
message.locale: Language code must not be blank.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACTTEXT_FV_CANCELED
message.locale: This contract text has been cancelled and cannot be modified.
This contract text has been canceled and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_LANGUAGECODE_NOT_MODIFIABLE
message.locale: The language code cannot be modified.
